stimulusHtml: The artist who created the Scenes from the Apocalypse chose imagery that was intended to elicit which of the following responses?

features.html:
The question refers to the image shown.

 
© The Pierpont Morgan Library / Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: Strong appreciation of the reigning monarchs and their divine right to rule
Deeper understanding of the relevance of biblical stories to the era in which viewers lived
A feeling of connection to biblical events through the inclusion of local saints
A renewed devotion to the family because of the scenes of domestic life
